start_url
https://artifactory-prod.tcc.etn.com/artifactory/PX-Embedded-External/vendor_source/azure/azure-iot-sdk-c-2020.07.19.7z
end_url

# Name the Azure version that will be extracted, which becomes its starting folder
start_unzip
azure-iot-sdk-c-2020-07-19
end_unzip

# Name the folders that are to be copied from the distro, and the folder path that they are to be copied to
start_copy
c-utility\inc c_utility\inc\
c-utility\src c_utility\src\
c-utility\pal\generic c_utility\pal\generic\
c-utility\deps\azure-macro-utils-c\inc c_utility\inc
c-utility\deps\umock-c\inc umock_c\inc\
c-utility\deps\umock-c\src umock_c\src\
iothub_client\inc iothub_client\inc\
iothub_client\src iothub_client\src\
umqtt\inc umqtt\inc\
umqtt\src umqtt\src\
end_copy


# Name the individual files that must be renamed to avoid filename conflicts in Babelfish
start_rename
..\c_utility\src\base64.c ..\c_utility\src\azure_base64.c
..\c_utility\src\buffer.c ..\c_utility\src\azure_buffer.c
..\c_utility\src\hmac.c ..\c_utility\src\azure_hmac.c
..\c_utility\src\hmacsha256.c ..\c_utility\src\azure_hmacsha256.c
..\c_utility\src\sha1.c ..\c_utility\src\azure_sha1.c
..\c_utility\src\sha224.c ..\c_utility\src\azure_sha224.c
..\c_utility\src\sha384-512.c ..\c_utility\src\azure_sha384-512.c
end_rename


# Name the individual or wildcarded files that must be removed (not needed or wanted for the build)
start_deleteme
..\iothub_client\src\*.def
..\iothub_client\src\iothubtransport_amqp*
..\iothub_client\src\iothubtransportamqp*
..\iothub_client\src\uamqp*
..\iothub_client\src\iothub_client_ll_uploadtoblob.c
end_deleteme
